verses.verse: It happened, <S%H2985><s%> when Jabin king <S%H4428><s%> of Hazor <S%H2674><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> of it, <S%H7971><s%> that he sent to Jobab <S%H3103><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Madon, <S%H4068><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Shimron, <S%H8110><s%> to the king <S%H4428><s%> of Achshaph, <S%H407><s%>

and to the kings <S%H4428><s%> who were on the north, <S%H6828><s%> in the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> in the Arabah <S%H6160><s%> south <S%H5045><s%> of Chinneroth, <S%H3672><s%> in the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> and in the heights <S%H5299><s%> of Dor <S%H1756><s%> on the west, <S%H3220><s%>

to the Canaanite <S%H3669><s%> on the east <S%H4217><s%> and on the west, <S%H3220><s%> and the Amorite, <S%H567><s%> and the Hittite, <S%H2850><s%> and the Perizzite, <S%H6522><s%> and the Jebusite <S%H2983><s%> in the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> and the Hivite <S%H2340><s%> under Hermon <S%H2768><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Mizpah. <S%H4709><s%>

They went out, <S%H3318><s%> they and all their armies <S%H4264><s%> with them, <S%H7227><s%> many people, <S%H5971><s%> even as the sand <S%H2344><s%> that is on the <S%H3220><s%> seashore <S%H8193><s%> in multitude, <S%H7230><s%> with very <S%H3966><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> horses <S%H5483><s%> and chariots. <S%H7393><s%>

All these kings <S%H4428><s%> met together; <S%H3259><s%> and they came <S%H935><s%> and encamped <S%H2583><s%> together <S%H3259><s%> at the waters <S%H4325><s%> of Merom, <S%H4792><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> with Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> "Don't <S%H3372><s%> be afraid because <S%H6440><s%> of them; <S%H4279><s%> for tomorrow at this time, <S%H6256><s%> I will deliver them up <S%H5414><s%> all slain <S%H2491><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%> You shall hamstring <S%H6131><s%> their horses <S%H5483><s%> and burn <S%H8313><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>"

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> came, <S%H935><s%> and all the people <S%H5971><s%> of war <S%H4421><s%> with him, <S%H4325><s%> against them by the waters of Merom <S%H4792><s%> suddenly, <S%H6597><s%> and fell on them. <S%H5307><s%>

Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> delivered <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and they struck <S%H5221><s%> them, <S%H7291><s%> and chased them to great <S%H7227><s%> Sidon, <S%H6721><s%> and to Misrephoth Maim, <S%H4956><s%> and to the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Mizpeh <S%H4708><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%> They struck <S%H5221><s%> them until they left <S%H7604><s%> them none remaining. <S%H8300><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> to them as Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> told <S%H559><s%> him. <S%H6131><s%> He hamstrung their horses <S%H5483><s%> and burnt <S%H8313><s%> their chariots <S%H4818><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> turned back <S%H7725><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> Hazor, <S%H2674><s%> and struck <S%H5221><s%> its king <S%H4428><s%> with the sword: <S%H2719><s%> for Hazor <S%H2674><s%> used <S%H6440><s%> to be the head <S%H7218><s%> of all those kingdoms. <S%H4467><s%>

They struck <S%H5221><s%> all the souls <S%H5315><s%> who were in it with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> utterly destroying <S%H2763><s%> them. <S%H3498><s%> There was no one left who breathed. <S%H5397><s%> He burnt <S%H8313><s%> Hazor <S%H2674><s%> with fire. <S%H784><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> captured <S%H3920><s%> all the cities <S%H5892><s%> of those kings, <S%H4428><s%> with their kings, <S%H4428><s%> and he struck <S%H5221><s%> them with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and utterly destroyed <S%H2763><s%> them; <S%H4872><s%> as Moses the servant <S%H5650><s%> of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded. <S%H6680><s%>

But as for the cities <S%H5892><s%> that stood <S%H5975><s%> on their mounds, <S%H8510><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> burned <S%H8313><s%> none of them, <S%H2108><s%> except Hazor <S%H2674><s%> only. <S%H3091><s%> Joshua burned that. <S%H8313><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> took all the spoil <S%H7998><s%> of these cities, <S%H5892><s%> with the livestock, <S%H929><s%> as spoils <S%H962><s%> for themselves; <S%H120><s%> but every man they struck <S%H5221><s%> with the edge <S%H6310><s%> of the sword, <S%H2719><s%> until they had destroyed <S%H8045><s%> them. <S%H7604><s%> They didn't leave any who breathed. <S%H5397><s%>

As Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> his servant, <S%H5650><s%> so Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Joshua. <S%H3091><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> so. <S%H5493><s%> He left nothing <S%H1697><s%> undone <S%H5493><s%> of all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> captured <S%H3947><s%> all that land, <S%H776><s%> the hill country, <S%H5045><s%> all the South, <S%H5045><s%> all the land <S%H5045><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> the lowland, <S%H8219><s%> the Arabah, <S%H6160><s%> the hill <S%H2022><s%> country of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and the lowland of the same; <S%H8219><s%>

from Mount <S%H2022><s%> Halak, <S%H2510><s%> that goes up <S%H5927><s%> to Seir, <S%H8165><s%> even to Baal Gad <S%H1171><s%> in the valley <S%H1237><s%> of Lebanon <S%H3844><s%> under Mount <S%H2022><s%> Hermon. <S%H2768><s%> He took <S%H3920><s%> all their kings, <S%H4428><s%> struck <S%H5221><s%> them, <S%H4191><s%> and put them to death.
Joshua <S%H3091><s%> made <S%H6213><s%> war <S%H4421><s%> a long <S%H7227><s%> time <S%H3117><s%> with all those kings. <S%H4428><s%>

There was not a city <S%H5892><s%> that made peace <S%H7999><s%> with the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> except the Hivites, <S%H2340><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Gibeon. <S%H1391><s%> They took <S%H3947><s%> all in battle. <S%H4421><s%>

For it was of Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> to harden <S%H2388><s%> their hearts, <S%H3820><s%> to come against <S%H7125><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in battle, <S%H4421><s%> that he might utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroy them, <S%H8467><s%> that they might have no favor, but that he might destroy <S%H8045><s%> them, <S%H3068><s%> as Yahweh commanded <S%H6680><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

Joshua <S%H3091><s%> came <S%H935><s%> at that time, <S%H6256><s%> and cut off <S%H3772><s%> the Anakim <S%H6062><s%> from the hill country, <S%H2022><s%> from Hebron, <S%H2275><s%> from Debir, <S%H1688><s%> from Anab, <S%H6024><s%> and from all the hill country <S%H2022><s%> of Judah, <S%H3063><s%> and from all the hill country <S%H2022><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> utterly <S%H2763><s%> destroyed them with their cities. <S%H5892><s%>

There were none of the Anakim <S%H6062><s%> left <S%H3498><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%> Only in Gaza, <S%H5804><s%> in Gath, <S%H1661><s%> and in Ashdod, <S%H795><s%> did some remain. <S%H7604><s%>

So Joshua <S%H3091><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> the whole land, <S%H776><s%> according to all that Yahweh <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses; <S%H4872><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> it for an inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to Israel <S%H3478><s%> according to their divisions <S%H4256><s%> by their tribes. <S%H7626><s%> The land <S%H776><s%> had rest <S%H8252><s%> from war. <S%H4421><s%>
